fields.title: Extract User Data from TikTok
fields.description:
This is a Python code that extracts information from a TikTok user's profile page.
The BeautifulSoup library is used to parse the HTML content of the page and find specific HTML elements that contain information about the user, such as their name, bio, follower count, following count, and the number of likes they have received.

fields.title: Telegram BOT | Search Student Detail (PDDIKTI)
fields.description:
This BOT i made in python programming language with Flask Framework. Telegram API i use webhook. Simple chat :
you can text your name/student number/combilation of them. BOT will send list of name from your text. when you click of detail, BOT will send detail student such as name, student id, college name, list of study programs that you take, and other.

fields.title: System Messages in The OpenAI API
fields.description: I've had the privilege of delving into the world of artificial intelligence and machine learning. My recent project involved interacting with the OpenAI API, specifically using the GPT-3.5 Turbo model. I crafted HTTP requests to facilitate dynamic conversations with the AI assistant, demonstrating its ability to comprehend and respond to user queries seamlessly. This hands-on experience allowed me to harness the power of AI in a practical context and gain valuable insights into the capabilities of state-of-the-art natural language processing models. It's an exciting journey into the future of technology, and I'm thrilled to be a part of it.

fields.title: Planetary API: Explore the Universe with Flask and SQLAlchemy
fields.description:
Planetary API is a powerful RESTful web service built using Flask, SQLAlchemy, and other essential Python libraries. This project allows you to explore the fascinating world of planets, providing information about various celestial bodies in our solar system.

Key Features:
- Retrieve data on planets, including their names, types, home stars, masses, radii, and distances from Earth.
- User registration and authentication for secure access to protected routes.
- Password retrieval functionality to ensure a seamless user experience.
- Data creation, modification, and deletion, all while maintaining data integrity (CRUD).
- Integration with the Flask-Mail extension to facilitate email communication (mailtrap.io).
- Built-in JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication to protect sensitive data and routes.

Unleash the power of this API to access, create, and manage planetary data effortlessly. Whether you're an astronomy enthusiast, educator, or researcher, Planetary API provides a reliable and user-friendly way to interact with celestial data. Dive into the universe and discover the mysteries of our solar system with ease.

fields.title: Neural Network-Based Number Recognition App
fields.description:
I have developed a project that I would like to present for analysis.
The project, titled "Neural Network-Based Number Recognition App," is a graphical user interface (GUI) application that leverages a Multi-Layer Perceptron (MLP) to recognize hand-drawn numbers. The application allows users to input seven features corresponding to each number, which are then processed through the MLP. The MLP has been trained to recognize numbers from 0 to 9. Users can adjust these input features through sliders, and the app will display the neural network's prediction in real-time. It also provides information on the training progress, including the number of training epochs and the training error.
This project is a practical demonstration of how neural networks can be utilized for pattern recognition, making it a valuable learning tool and a fun interactive application.

fields.title: OpenAI API | Function Calling
fields.description: I have implemented a Python script that leverages OpenAI's GPT-3.5 Turbo model to make API calls for natural language processing. The code demonstrates how to send a POST request to the OpenAI API, using the requests library, to obtain responses for various queries. Additionally, it includes specific functions like 'locationQuery' for retrieving current weather data and 'authorQuery' for obtaining information about authors. This project showcases my proficiency in API integration and demonstrates how to interact with the OpenAI platform for text-based tasks.

fields.title: RESTful Django | Django RESTful Drink Service
fields.description: This project is a RESTful web service built with Django and Django REST Framework. It provides an API for managing a database of drinks. The API supports standard CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on drink objects. It allows clients to retrieve a list of all drinks, add a new drink to the database, retrieve details of a specific drink, update a drinkâ€™s details, or delete a drink from the database. This project demonstrates proficiency in Django, Django REST Framework, and the principles of RESTful API design.

fields.title: CRM | Simple CRUD with Django
fields.description: I'm proud to showcase a Django-based web application that simplifies user management. Our project offers user registration, login, and data management capabilities, ensuring smooth operations for organizations. With features like record creation, updates, and deletions, it streamlines data control, making it a valuable tool for HR, customer support, and more. Customer Relationship Management (CRM).

fields.title: Countermeasure Against Online Scams: Python-Based Website Attack
fields.description:
In response to the rampant surge in online scams, including deceitful gift giveaways, fraudulent bank approval requests, and deceptive acts that lead to financial losses. I embarked on a project aimed at combating online fraudsters. The project, titled "Countermeasure Against Online Scams: Python-Based Website Attack," is designed to serve as a proactive approach to protect potential victims from falling prey to these malicious schemes.

The primary objective of this project is twofold. First, it acts as a stern lesson for deceptive websites by implementing countermeasures that spam their web forms, rendering them ineffective in deceiving individuals. Secondly, it strives to ensure that these deceptive websites become temporarily unavailable to potential victims by overwhelming them with a high volume of spam, thus reducing the likelihood of further successful scams.

By creating and implementing this innovative solution in Python, I aim to contribute to the safety and security of online users. This project underscores my commitment to using technology to counteract online threats and provide a safer digital environment for all.
